title: Ticket #2860: new manual chapter for contrib
description:
Our documentation of "contrib" modules is not clear. There are 2 types:
  1. separate, standalone code distributed via web page. These are often identified as contrib modules.
  2. Well-defined modules of code that are part of the source, but not the distributed binaries. Someone wanting to use these modules would have to acquire the source and compile it.

Since some of each category are embedded in the manual, the proposal is to introduce a new chapter that will contain sections of documentation associated with modules. Each section is to clearly identify whether it is type 1 or type 2.
